url:
Use the following URL to let the bot join your server!
https://discordapp.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id={clientId}&scope=bot
welcome:
**Thank you for adding me!** ðŸ”¥
- My prefix is `{prefix}`. Want to change it? Check all configuration options here: **<https://github.com/markokajzer/discord-soundbot/wiki/Configuration>**.
- You can see a list of commands with `{prefix}help.`
- Get started with one of the sample sounds `{prefix}airhorn` or `{prefix}johncena`.
- Add your own sounds by using `{prefix}add` and dragging in a sound file!
- Need more help? Join the support server: **<https://discordapp.com/invite/JBw2BNx>**.

help.headline: Use the prefix `{prefix}` with the following commands:

sounds.loop: Loop specified sound <count> times or endlessly
sounds.next: Interrupt currently playing sound with specified sound
sounds.stop: Leave channel and clear the queue

entrance.set: Play the specified sound when you join a channel

exit.set: Play the specified sound when you leave a channel

help.avatar: Set, show or remove the avatar

userFinder.error: User not found on this server.

attachment.extension: Sound has to be in accepted format, one of [{extensions}]!
attachment.format: Filename has to be all letters and numbers!

errors.noAvatar: Avatar not set yet. Try adding one with `{prefix}avatar` and an image!
errors.tooFast: You are changing your avatar too fast. Try again later.

sounds.notFound: You don't have any sounds yet! Try adding one with the {prefix}add command.
